data.name: Villa: AI Creation & Collaboration
data.description:
* GenAI Assistant. Get hours of nonstop AI interactions included with a subscription. Learn 20 languages, acquire new skills, get answers to tough questions. Get AI product support

* Virtual Travel in multiplayer on Google Earth! Go on adventures anywhere on Earth in 3D, plan travel, bucket lists, real estate, and more!

* Zoom from/to VR: Villa subscribers can initiate or join a Zoom meeting from VR. Non-VR users can join and experience VR immersion via a Zoom link. Perfect for hybrid meetings.

* Broadcast to thousands of users in VR

* Create GenAI Art in VR alone or in multiplayer

* Subscribe in-app for all features as Superhuman, or join as Instant Accountless for partial features. Free 7-day trial available. Choose monthly, annual, or one time purchases. Annual subscriptions offer up to 53% discount.

* Villas are 3D channels offering private conf rooms and vast outdoor experiences. Spawn and build with millions of 3D objects for socials, meetings, and conferences. Choose from repos in-app or drag/drop your HQ/office/home or any obj, fbx, gltf, glb, jpeg, png, mp3, NFT to your web account
* Fly supersonic! Create unlimited fullbody (with legs) avatars. Meet privately or publicly. As Admin, screen who joins your org.

* Galactica game (in-app): Own & develop virtual land or sell to earn!

* Building in 3D is fun! Build worlds increasingly with AI including AI Art, 3D Objects, 3D soundtracks, images, VFX - no code required

* Proptech flythroughs
